definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Comparisons with our previous studies on the Yami children were included in the present report.
sentences.chinese: 本報告中亦包括與蘭嶼學童調查結果之比較。

sentences.english: During 2 years observation and came to the conclusion that the best training method was branch bending method.
sentences.chinese: 經兩年調查結果，三種方法中以屈株法效果最佳。

sentences.english: I thank countries who are making the results of their investigations publicly available.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心感謝將調查結果公之於衆的國家。

sentences.english: They published their findings in a recent issue of the Journal of Sexual Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 他們在最近的性醫學期刊中發表了其調查結果。

sentences.english: And these findings are more favourable to Bush than more recent surveys.
sentences.chinese: 與很多近來調查相比，這些調查結果比較傾向於布什。

sentences.english: But Hawks and others say the news media misinterpreted the findings.
sentences.chinese: 但霍克和其他人說，新聞媒體曲解了調查結果。

sentences.english: The findings uphold Iraq's prewar insistence that it did not possess chemical or biological weapons.
sentences.chinese: 調查結果支持了伊拉克戰前聲稱沒有生化武器的聲明。

sentences.english: Musole's findings were shared with various Zambian government ministries.
sentences.chinese: 穆索萊將調查結果向贊比亞有關各部做了通報。

sentences.english: A survey on the epidemiology of Leucocytozoonosis in chicken was carried out during1985-1988 in Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 本文報告福建省雞住白蟲病的流行病學調查結果。
但是調查結果有高有低。

sentences.english: A month later, he took his findings back to his superiors.
sentences.chinese: 一個月後，他帶着調查結果返回到他的上級部門。

sentences.english: At the same time, the response to the climate and pests in Enshi area were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 同時，記錄了它在恩施的物候反應及病蟲害調查結果。

sentences.english: The resulting balance of -15% marked the third month in a row of declining sales.
sentences.chinese: 調查結果15%的差額標誌着銷售額連續三個月下降。

sentences.english: These findings shouldn't be that controversial.
sentences.chinese: 這些調查結果不該是有爭議的。

sentences.english: The relevant department on the Kyrgyz side has released the investigation result.
sentences.chinese: 目前吉方有關部門公佈了調查結果。

sentences.english: The accused was remanded in custody for a further week to await the outcome of police investigation.
sentences.chinese: 被告被送返監獄再等1周以待警方調查結果。

definition: investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to inform/to report/to make known/report/speech/talk/lecture/CL:篇[pian1],份[fen4],個|个[ge4],通[tong4]
participant in a survey/an interviewee/those questioned
to give an interview/to be interviewed/to respond to (questions, a survey etc)
joint signatures (on a letter or declaration)
